verbose_text: The cells were then cultured ex vivo with or without OVA 257-264 peptide in the presence of brefeldin A and the ability of the adoptively transferred CD8 + T cells (CD45.2 +) to produce IFN-gamma and upregulate CD40L was evaluated using intracellular staining and flow cytometry.
evidence: CD8 +  T cells (CD45.2 + ) to produce IFN-gamma
